queries.natural_language: Find users who registered in the last 30 days
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM users WHERE created_at >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '30 days';
SELECT status, COUNT(*) as total_orders FROM orders GROUP BY status;

queries.natural_language: Get user details with their order count
queries.sql: SELECT u.id, u.name, u.email, COUNT(o.id) as order_count FROM users u LEFT JOIN orders o ON u.id = o.user_id GROUP BY u.id, u.name, u.email;
queries.description: Join users with orders and count

queries.natural_language: Find products with price greater than 100
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;

queries.natural_language: Calculate average order value by month
queries.sql: SELECT DATE_TRUNC('month', created_at) as month, AVG(total_amount) as avg_order_value FROM orders GROUP BY DATE_TRUNC('month', created_at) ORDER BY month;

queries.natural_language: Find top 10 customers by total spent
queries.sql: SELECT u.name, SUM(o.total_amount) as total_spent FROM users u JOIN orders o ON u.id = o.user_id GROUP BY u.id, u.name ORDER BY total_spent DESC LIMIT 10;
queries.description: Top customers by spending with limit

queries.natural_language: List products that have never been ordered
queries.sql: SELECT p.* FROM products p LEFT JOIN order_items oi ON p.id = oi.product_id WHERE oi.product_id IS NULL;
queries.description: Find products with no orders using LEFT JOIN
